com.neopixl.spitfire

Class SpitfireManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neopixl.spitfire.SpitfireManager

  • public final class SpitfireManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class used to store the object mapper ObjectMapper and the default retry policy RetryPolicy used by all requests. It acts as a singleton.

    Created by Florian ALONSO on 12/30/16. For Neopixl
